item.title: CVE-2024-31364|2024-04-12T12:19:09.725Z -- elextensions -- elex%20woocommerce%20dynamic%20pricing%20and%20discounts
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ELEXtensions ELEX WooCommerce Dynamic Pricing and Discounts.This issue affects ELEX WooCommerce Dynamic Pricing and Discounts: from n/a through 2.1.2.
